remarks: Any element greater than 0 and not an atom majorizes a lattice line. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jun-2012.)
statement:
llnle.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
llnle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
llnle.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
llnle.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
llnle.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
llnle $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) /\ ( X =/= .0. /\ -. X e. A ) ) -> E. y e. N y .<_ X ) $.
$d .<_ y $.
$d K y $.
$d N y $.
$d X y $.
